items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this!
items.body: Fits to size, very flattering and came wrinkle free. It's really cute and comfortable. I wore it with a belt that pinched in the waist but not necessary. Read more
items.author: Julie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Long waist
items.body: I did not like this product. The waist hit me very low- and I am 5’8. The fabric was comfortable and stretchy- but I wouldn’t say this was a formal dress by any means. You could dress it up for a bridal/baby shower but not appropriate for a wedding. Read more
items.author: Meredith Bailey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Fun, and Flowy—Wish I Got to Wear It!
items.body: I absolutely loved this green dress! The fit was spot-on when I first got it—super flattering without being too tight, and the material felt really nice and high quality. One of the best parts? It’s not sheer at all, which is always a win with lighter-colored dresses. The flowy fabric made it so fun to twirl in, and the off-shoulder design added just the right touch of sexy without being over the top. I paired it with a black belt and color block heels, and it looked so cute styled that way. I had planned to wear it on a holiday, but unfortunately I lost a bit too much weight before the trip and it no longer fit me quite right. Still, I can’t recommend this dress enough—comfortable, elegant, and just really fun to wear! Read more
items.author: kelley

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Should be made with less polyester then it would be cooler!
items.body: Lovely dress, but the fabric is quite thick and a heavy polyester. It would be a sweat box if it weren't for the shoulder treatment for allow for air. Not for humid weather. Read more
items.author: Sunny

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good dress
items.body: Dress was cute just not for me. It wasn’t flattering and I gave birth a year ago. Didn’t help hide the tummy at all. The arms were hard to move in. For something who’s skinny and has no kids this would be a great dress. It’s flowy and the material was very comfortable and lightweight. Read more
items.author: Sami Verrelli

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality, See Through
items.body: it is VERY see through. Color accuracy & style was perfect. Read more
items.author: Martin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy expensive looking summer dress!
items.body: This dress was perfect for my pregnancy announcement photoshoot! I was surprised by how soft it was. Would be cute for a wedding, event or even just a date night! The material is thicker and feels very expensive! I ordered a size L. I’m usually a large in most dresses, but especially now so I can grow into it throughout my pregnancy. It is a very flattering fit. Not see through at all! Read more
items.author: Keely Bridges

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dressy enough for a nice celebration!
items.body: My daughter looks lovely in this dress!! So classy. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Sleeveless Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Sleeveless Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Apricot, Rose, Army Green, Black, Sage, Dusty Blue, Light Blue, Red, Pink, Peacock Blue, Dragon Fruit, Green, Light Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
